Package org.fit.cssbox.css

Class Summary
AttributeSpec A specification of a required value of an attribute according to a selector specification.
CSSNorm This class provides static methods for CSS property analysis.
CSSUnits CSS unit conversion functions.
DOMAnalyzer This class implements methods for the DOM tree style analysis.
GenericTagOutput  
HTMLNorm This class provides a mechanism of converting some HTML presentation atributes to the CSS styles.
InlineSelectorSpec This is an 'inline selector'.
NodeSpec A node specification used in a selector.
NormalOutput An output generator that outputs the DOM tree in a standard (xml) way
Output Abstract class that represents any document output implementation.
RGBColor This class implements the RGB color definition decoder.
RuleSpec A CSS rule specification with a parsed selector.
SelectorSpec A selector specification.
StyleSheet A style sheet with the rules oredered by priority.
